description: The Diagram Generation Service subsystem is encapsulated within the diagram_analysis package. Its primary function is to transform structured architectural data into visual diagrams, enhancing comprehension through interactive representations.

components.name: diagram_analysis.analysis_json
components.description: This component is responsible for processing and structuring raw architectural data into a standardized, machine-readable format (likely JSON). It acts as a crucial data preparation layer, ensuring that the input for diagram generation is consistent and well-formed.

components.name: diagram_analysis.diagram_generator
components.description: This is the core engine of the subsystem, tasked with taking the structured architectural data (prepared by analysis_json) and transforming it into a visual diagram format. It likely leverages external tools like Mermaid.js for rendering the visual output.

components.name: Unclassified
components.description: Component for all unclassified files and utility functions (Utility functions/External Libraries/Dependencies)
